text: Francesc Homs Molist (born 5 September 1969) is a Spanish politician. He was born in Barcelona. He served as Minister of the Presidency and Spokesperson of the Government of Catalonia.Francesc Homs se convierte en el hombre fuerte del nuevo Govern de Mas, La Vanguardia, 27 December 2012 He ran in the 2016 general election, but came in last place. He was a member of the Parliament of Catalonia from 2003 to 2010. He was writer of the draft of the new Statute of Catalonia on behalf of Convergència i Unió (CiU), and speaker of the new Statute (2006). ==References== Category:Living people Category:1969 births Category:Politicians from Barcelona
title: Francesc Homs Molist
